summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy, mountainous environment. The central character, seen from behind, is wearing armor and appears to be engaged in combat with an enemy, highlighted by a red dashed circle. The enemy has a visible health bar above its head, indicating its status in the fight. The user interface includes several components: a health bar and a resource bar at the bottom left, alongside hexagonal icons suggesting abilities or items. On the right side, there is a "Will" counter displaying the number 66, possibly indicating a resource or currency. The top right corner shows a "+86" and "oil," which may relate to points or items collected. The environment is detailed with snow-covered rocks and sparse vegetation, creating a challenging terrain for the encounter.
